(92.2%) ema samasthaya atharin purushayinge saksharathawa 93.5% k wana athara sthi්range saksharathawa 91.1% ki.

shri lanka pasal boksin sangamaya meheya wu ti.bi.chaya pasal boksin tharagawaliye samastha shurathawa athkara ganimata kanthale ganthalawa maha widyalaya samathwiya.43wani warata pawathi me tharagawaliye di widyartha widuhala dewani sthanaya labagath athara horana shri medhankara maha widyalaya thewani sthanayata pathwiya.kuliyapitiya saranath maha widyalaye di pasugiyada pawathi me tharagawaliye dakshathama kridakaya sammanaya dina ganu labuwe santha silwesthara maha widyalaye es.chandu wisini.
haggala malwaththa watetama pawathina janawasa hethuwen mema prakashaye sathyayak athayi sithiya hakiya.rawana rajuge mal udyanaya samanwithawa thibi aththe ashoka wargaye mal gaswalini.
